message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper deals with the problem of forecasting people trajectories and head poses, which is a common task in computer vision and robotics. The proposed approach leverages deep learning techniques, specifically LSTM networks, to jointly reason on short-term trajectories (tracklets) and head orientations (vislets). This makes the paper relevant to several sub-categories of arXiv CS, including computer vision (cs.CV), machine learning (cs.LG), robotics (cs.RO), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and social and information networks (cs.SI). Among these, cs.CV is the most likely category, as the paper focuses on visual data and proposes a novel approach for modeling the interplay between positions and head orientations.
